1085810.name: ORR Demo
1085810.description: Demo is single player only. Demo includes four championship races, each with a secret objective that unlocks a special level(4 races, 4 special levels). The levels have no blocked areas and are fully explorable, but most only have one hidden goal(They are mostly empty at this point). This is an early build and the game will likely change, but this demo should be considered as final game quality.
